body.name: Angetube Webcam, 2K Streaming Webcam with Ring Light, HDR Laptop Camera with Remote, Dual Stereo Microphone and Privacy Cover, Auto Focus 5X Zoom in, Computer Camera for Zoom/Skype/Teams/Webex
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 21 hrs 26 mins
FREE delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 41 mins
features: 【Angetube 863Plus HDR 2K Webcam】True 2K Ultra HDR webcam, up to 2560*1440p, always shows your face at its best during every video conversation. Even after using the 5x magnified capability of the zoomable camera for computer, there is NO blur. Note: Windows 7 supports a maximum resolution of 1080p/30fps and is not capable of 2K resolution. To enjoy this 2K webcam, please make sure your software and screen support 2K!

【Streaming Webcam with Remote Control included Adapter】PLEASE NOTICE, THE REMOTE CAN NOT CONTROL THE WEBCAM RING LIGHT. The laptop camera works with USB A and USB C, included Adapter. Control your video calls with a remote so that even away from the desk. It has a one-button mute, turns on/off the image, e-PTZ, Autofocus/Fixed focus switching, adjusting exposure value , which can get the image you want even in low light.

【3 Colors and Multi-step Brightness Webcam 】 The streaming camera with ring light that offers lighting compensation at three different colors with touch control back of the webcam. You could choose the brightness and colos you like depending on your environment, achieving your ideal light conditions.

【Webcam Built-In Privacy Cover & Dual Mics】The stream webcam built-in privacy cover allows you to enjoy safe digital web life. When not in use, you can slide on the built-in privacy cover to shield yourself from the USB Webcam's view.

【Plug and Play Webcam & Wide Compatibility】The computer camera is perfect for Zoom/Facetime/Video Calling/OBS/Twitch/Facebook/YouTube/Xbox one/Conferencing/Recording/Online School. Compatible with Windows XP/7/8/10/11, Mac OS 10.6 and above, Linux 2.6.24 and above, Chrome OS 29.0.1547.70 and above, Android V5.0 above smart TV and TV Box, XBox One, Ubuntu Linux 10.04 and above

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Please refer to the (PDF Instructions for use) of the Product guides and documents for detailed remote control function introduction
Previous page Next page 1 3 Colors Ring Light 2 Privacy Cover 3 High Quality Lens 4 Suit for 1/4 inch Tripod

863PLUS Webcam with HDR, 3DNR, what is the HDR, 3DNR? HDR is High Dynamic Range Imaging, HDR can display superior images in scenes with large contrast between light and dark, which is suitable for more harsh backlight environments, making images more transparent and layering more distinct. 3DNR works better in low-light scenes with less noise. 863Plus Webcam with Autofocus and Manual focus Switch between manual focus and auto focus according to your needs, Autofocus always provide you with the best focus position to ensure the high quality of video imaging. Manual focus can define the appropriate focal length by yourself for better display Webcam with 3 colors and no-step lightness Webcam ring light colors only via touch pod of the webcam rear and lightness only via spin button of the webcam side Angetube Software Online Angetube webcam is plug and play, no need to download any other drivers. We launch Angetube software to allow customers to adjust the camera parameters according to their usage environment and needs.

No response when pressing any button on the remote control? Open the battery cover of the remote control, take out the batteries, remove the insulation paper, and then reinstall the batteries. Test if the buttons are functioning properly. If not, please replace the batteries. After replacing with new batteries, the remote control shows no response to any button? Due to significant interference from wireless signals in the environment, the remote control is losing codes. It needs to be re-paired, Please check ourmessage or contact with us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great web camera that does what it says it will do! Works with Sonic Pad!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this Web camera to monitor my 3d print processes using the Creality Sonic Pad.It's as if this camera was made for that purpose! All of it's functionality is available with the Sonic Pad Klipper OS. The remote works as described and the customer service is second to none!I only use this camera for the one purpose, but it excels at that purpose where others failed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Has a ring light to illuminate one's face and it is adjustable in intensity and color shade.
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to set up and worked right away. I could not load their proprietary driver which gives added features which I wanted to try, but the Microsoft driver works. I liked the ring light and also the zoom feature in the lens. I could adjust the view of me anyway I wanted. There is also adjustment to make the video seem like a mirror image of me or correct as other people see me. I'm very impressed for a modest price the video aspects of the camera. I think the microphone could be improved. Maybe I sit too far away from the mic. It is adequate for zoom sessions but nothing to brag about.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No remote, no usb a to c adapter.
reviews.reviewText: ****Updated. Besides the initial purchase which I needed for a specific event, I later returned the defective product and re-ordered. I have to say the camera is clear, focus is usually spot on. I like the fact I can change the white light color to warm. Works great on a Mac****Original review: Box arrived and I feel scammed, no remote, usb a to c adapter, doesn’t look like the camera was used, just looks like it doesn’t come with any of those bits. Frustrating, I was going to use this for a meeting in a few days and a different camera won’t arrive in time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for video meetings
reviews.reviewText: Great little camera, particularly since you have to ability to Zoom in to show your face and not your other surroundings. Reasonably priced as well

reviews.reviewerName: George M Acord I I I
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good camera bad control an zoom is terrible

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars VERYYYYY Easy to work with!!
reviews.reviewText: The plug and play works GREAT!! The picture quality, sounds and so far everything else is exceptionally good. My sisters and I got it for our Dad for his Birthday and Father’s Day and it is perfect for him. HE LOVES IT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars After replacement of the 2K and 1080p webcams - Still JUNK
reviews.reviewText: Purchased two cams the 1080p and the 2K. Needed a zoomable webcam for school, this item was delivered used, dirty and missing the user, manual. The boxes were not sealed and was clearing damaged and pre opened. The the battery for the remote was old, scratchy and dead. After I changed the battery the remote didn't zoom or adjust the distance, not many feature worked. Only the USB2 connector worked, the USB-C adapter didn't work at all. I requested a replacement in hopes the new item will function properly. The seller needs to seriously consider a simple clear sticker to seal the webcam box. Fingers crossed the replacement works out better.After receiving the replacement 2K webcam - I'm heart aches because I wanted deeply for this cam to do what it's suppose to do. The 5 replies from the seller attempted to waist my time with reassurances of my product satisfaction. I asked a very specific question concerning the backwards panning text and they repeatedly avoided my question. I'm done. I'm returning for refund.After receiving the replacement 1080p webcam - just shaking my head in sadness. The over exposure does not auto correct. My light is perfect for my complexion, and my logi webcam reflects a natural look and exposure quickly. Clearly this webcam is lacking on so many levels. This item should not be sold as a serious webcam. How do all four items have acceptable errors and flaws that the seller explains away like this is something a customer should learn to deal with. Like I should look past a car with no doors. STOP SELLING ITEMS WITH KNOWN TECHNICAL FLAWS. VERY SAD.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This camera is excellent! I can zoom in or out and move it side to side with a remote. I’ve gotten compliments on how I look like I’m airbrushed

reviews.reviewTitle: Image is distorted - its not out of focus - its overly sharpened and looks like a hologram image
reviews.reviewText: The picture looks like its overly sharp where my image looks distorted. There is no way for me to soften the image.

Necesitaba una WebCam ya que la que tenia (Logitech) la tuve que poner en otro ordenador.... Estuve mirando muchas y muchas reseñas... Al final me decidí por esta. Por características y prestaciones, a parte que otra marca con estas o similares características hubiera costado mucho más.Una vez instalada y utilizada he de decir que me encanta, es bonita, llena de prestaciones (y todas funcionan), un mando a distancia que va genial, etc. etc... Funciona muy bien....He tenido que solicitarles un código para poner el programa que trae en marcha y he de decir que son rápidos, atentos y amable... Vamos una atención al cliente de diez...Un buen producto, buen precio, buena atención al cliente yo recomiendo y yo mismo volvería a comprar...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 8, 2023

reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Wie man in meinem Video sieht, hat die Angetube 2k Kamera eine echt gute Performance insbesondere gegen wesentlich teurere Kameras. Das Bild ist knackig scharf und darauf kommt es an. Denn meistens benutzt man andere Mikrofon und auch das eingebaute Ringlicht bringt kaum etwas. Aber die Kamera liefert ein top Bild!

The media could not be loaded. Abbiamo il telecomando, che scopriremo poi a cosa servirà molto molto interessante, infine la webcam eccola ve la faccio vedere, webcam che è molto robusta prima cosa quindi fatta di plastica ma molto robusta, ha un cavo lungo, ha la base di appoggio che si adatta sia ai monitor ma anche ai televisori, può essere montata sul piedistallo quello per la videocamera, ha direttamente un LED integrato dove in base al, voglio dire alle varie funzioni che l'anello attorno alla luce ha, possiamo aumentare abbassare la luminosità ma anche cambiare gradazione di colore. Questa è una 2K ricordo HDR presa USB quella classica ma dentro la scatola troviamo anche la presa USB da USB a USB C quindi per le nuove i nuovi standard. Detto questo andremo a provare assieme, ma subito, subitissimo, questa bellissima webcam della "Angetube". Amici eccoci qua con la Angeube 2K: Guardate che bella definizione, che bel colore e anche la messa a fuoco e il soggetto è sempre bene a fuoco, guardate il microfono guardate me, dietro sfoca leggermente; una cosa importante che voglio dirvi, che questa è l'impostazione di default, poi si possono modificare tanti parametri e il telecomando da la possibilità in maniera molto molto semplice se scegliere i 50 Hz o i 60 Hz, se andare a fare un ingrandimento, quindi fino a 5X digitale e andare a centrare l'immagine quindi poter spostare l'immagine con l'ingrandimento guardate adesso torno alla modalità normale. Poter attivare disattivare il microfono suo perché ha un bellissimo microfono integrato, poter andare a scegliere anche la luminosità quindi abbassare la luminosità quindi l'abbasso guardate è, abbasso la luminosità vedete, oppure la vado ad aumentare oppure c'è il tastino per rendere la luminosità con impostazioni di default eccola qui e torna normale. Abbiamo la possibilità anche di mettere l'Auto Focus in modo che in base a cosa inquadra la telecamera e abbiamo subito l'Auto Focus, possiamo specchiare l'immagine, possiamo rovesciare l'immagine, rovesciarla e specchiarla, possiamo tornare poi alla modalità principale. Detto questo sicuramente una webcam molto interessante, il prezzo sui 75 euro poi varia su Amazon, ma bella dettagliata ben definita e il fatto che abbia anche la luce, quindi il suo anello luminoso per poter fare subito una registrazione anche molto veritiera e anche far vedere il proprio viso all'interlocutore magari su Skype su Zoom o sulle varie piattaforme di videoconferenza. Quindi per è promossa: ottima webcam, prezzo onesto, nel packaging abbiamo comunque un cavo lungo, abbiamo il comando, abbiamo anche la garanzia, libretto di istruzioni, quello rapido e l'adattatore da USB a USB C quindi amici, secondo me è promossa a pieni voti! Che avrei preferito un pochino sicuramente la messa a fuoco un po' migliore un po' più veloce, perché vedete se mi scanso guardate che succede: dietro abbiamo comunque tutta la strumentazione però non è perfettamente a fuoco, sicuramente perché c'è una distanza e quindi comunque non è facile avere un' Auto Focus a lungo raggio però avrei preferito sicuramente un dettaglio maggiore su questa cosa qui! Certo è una webcam ripeto intermedia, quindi già che abbia questa bellissima risoluzione, questi colori e questa possibilità di settaggio sicuramente è perfetta!
